qas.question: What did European cultural ideas follow?
What type of music rose toward the end of the era?
What did nationalism in music sometime echo?
Edvard Grieg and Antonin Dvorak used what kind of music in their compositions?

context: European cultural ideas and institutions began to follow <a0_0>colonial expansion<a0_0/> into other parts of the world. There was also a rise, especially toward the end of the era, of <a1_0>nationalism<a1_0/> in music (echoing, in some cases, <a2_0>political sentiments of the time<a2_0/>), as composers such as Edvard Grieg, Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov, and Antonín Dvořák echoed <a3_0>traditional music of their homelands<a3_0/> in their compositions.
